CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(House_Building_Name__c),"",House_Building_Name__c) & IF(ISBLANK(House_Building_Name__c),"",", ") & IF(ISBLANK(Street__c),"",Street__c) & IF(ISBLANK(Street__c),"",", ") & IF(ISBLANK(Village__c),"",Village__c) & IF(ISBLANK(Village__c),"",", ") & IF(ISBLANK( Are_Town__c ),"",Are_Town__c ) & IF(ISBLANK(Are_Town__c ),"",", ") & IF(ISBLANK( City_County__c ),"",City_County__c ) & IF(ISBLANK(City_County__c ),"",", ") & IF(ISBLANK( Postcode__c ),"",Postcode__c ) & IF(ISBLANK(Postcode__c ),"",", ") & IF(ISBLANK(Country__c ),"",Country__c )
CustomField.label: Address
